title: Magic Lantern Slide  [Steam train, train tracks and men working]
brief_description: Glass Lantern Slide with black tape and cream paper-based tape. The sepia toned photograph is framed internally by a black oval shaped framed. [Photograph of a steam train, train tracks and men working]
